mapper.select: select t.id, t.title, t.cover_url, t.latitude, t.longitude, s.title as typeTitle from poi_point t left join poi_type s on t.type_id = s.id where t.deleted = false and t.area_code = #{areaCode} order by id desc
select id, title, cover_url, latitude, longitude, introduce, detail_address from poi_point where deleted = false and type_id = #{typeId} order by id desc
